description: You loved the Echo Tee, Echo Tank and Echo headwear pieces so much Outdoor Research decided to throw in an extra way to top off your mountain chasing dreams: the Echo Hoody Built with the same UPF sun protection and Polygiene® odor control as the rest of the collection, the Echo Hoody is the latest way to work out in one ultra-lightweight, superbly breathable training top.
name: Outdoor Research Echo Hoodie - Mens
